title: Zoo animals in rhyme

description: Amusing rhymes tell us something about zoo animals children love most - the lion, monkey, elephant, kangaroo, giraffe, bear and many others. A basis for storytelling, vocabulary building, rhyme making, and many related activities. Also brings to the class-room elementary science concepts about animal life.
